>
[Improved Reflexive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=423) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 153 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Reflexive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=383)

</column>

---

Your shield can help save nearby allies. When you use [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) against damage resulting from a Reflex save, adjacent allies who would take damage due to Reflex saves against the same effect also benefit from the damage reduction.
